name: SaaS_Company_Drive
description: Centralized repository for all company documents, resources, and assets.

metadata.purpose: Standardized directory structure for SaaS companies to organize all business documents and resources

directories.name: 01_Administrative
directories.description: Administrative documents including legal, HR, and financial resources.
directories.retention_policy: 7 years for financial documents, permanent for legal documents

readme_extra.usage_guidelines: Store all administrative documents here. Ensure sensitive documents are properly secured with appropriate access controls.

subdirectories.name: Legal_Documents
subdirectories.description: Legal documents including incorporation papers, contracts, compliance documentation, and intellectual property.

readme_extra.usage_guidelines: This directory contains legally sensitive documents. Only authorized personnel should access or modify these files.

subdirectories.name: Incorporation_and_Business_Formation
subdirectories.description: Documents related to company incorporation, business registration, and formation.

subdirectories.name: Contracts
subdirectories.description: All company contracts including vendor agreements, client contracts, and partnerships.

subdirectories.name: Intellectual_Property
subdirectories.description: Patents, trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property documentation.

subdirectories.name: Compliance
subdirectories.description: Regulatory compliance documentation, certifications, and audit reports.

subdirectories.name: HR_and_People
subdirectories.description: Human resources documentation including employee handbooks, hiring resources, benefits information, and team policies.

readme_extra.usage_guidelines: Contains sensitive employee information. Access restricted to HR team and management.

subdirectories.name: Employee_Handbook
subdirectories.description: Current and past versions of the employee handbook.

subdirectories.name: Hiring_and_Recruiting

subdirectories.description: Financial documentation including budgets, investor reports, expense tracking, and fundraising materials.

readme_extra.usage_guidelines: Store all financial documents here. Highly sensitive information with restricted access.

subdirectories.name: Budgets_and_Forecasts

subdirectories.name: Investor_Relations
